this game is really old but fun

[h1] Counter-Strike: Source [/h1]

[b] A Decent Shooter Nowadays, If A Bit Jarring To Play [/b]

[b] Counter Strike: Source [/b] is nearly 15 years old, and yet still has some pretty good physics and gameplay for a multiplayer FPS title. The servers aren't very populated, but it is still possible to get into a lobby for a somewhat normal match, or even for a gun-game type of match. 

The visuals are dated compared to  modern game of course, but they look pretty good for a 2004 title. The gunplay is nice and responsive, and the audio is crisp and pretty loud at times, drawing you into the game even more. 

The physics system is different than the original [b] Counter-Strike [/b], which is nice at times with some fights. I've never really been a fan of CS grenades, so I can't really give an honest evaluation of the system for those since I am a bit biased against them. They're just "meh" to me, but serve their purpose at times. As for maps and guns, a lot are taken from the OG title, so not much has really changed here.

Honestly, the game is sort of dead at this point. Yes there are still some servers and players, so you can get some enjoyment out of this one, but it won't really be the intended experience at all. I can still [b] Recommend [/b] the game since it is cheap and fun for a bit, but it isn't a very highly recommended title. I would play this one over the original unless you really enjoy the feel of that title, but CSGO is more modern and populated so that players can experience the game in a more natural setting.

[h2] Final Verdict: 6/10 (Above Average) [/h2]

If you enjoyed this review, feel free to check out my curator page for my thoughts on a variety of other games!

A classic, with good graphics for the time and active community servers. Only get if you loved CS 1.6 or CSGO and you will be satisfied. The shooting mechanics are similar to CS 1.6 but much more fluid and slightly harder to learn. de_office is my favorite map but all the other ones are nice too. Definitely grab it for 2 bucks if it goes on sale.

CS:S servers are pretty dead. There's a lot of fairly active Russian servers but they're almost all Dust 2 24/7, which gets annoying. If you can run GO, play GO. If you can't run GO, then Source or 1.6 are good alternatives! That said, Source is easier to play than GO, so it's more of a casual game. And it's pretty good for being a casual game.

güzel sıradan cs işte fazla kafa yormaya gerek yok alıyorsan al
FPS de segunda geração, o melhor na minha opiniao por anos...

首先，在我很小很小的时候就开始玩cs了，当时是我的表哥带我入坑的cs，虽然长大后没能和职业选手一样在荧幕上奋战，但是小时候还是蛮幸福的。当时只有10岁，玩的盗版的cs1.6叫迪酷cs，也玩过改版的生化狂潮。迪酷cs1.6只能打人机，地图还蛮全的。那时候只有一台大屁股显示器的电脑，内存只有256MB正好可以打cs1.6，家里没有网络也玩不了别的游戏。很喜欢那时候的MP5因为弹道很准射速也快，AK不好压枪不太喜欢。后来玩过起源，怀念可以无限抖动的尸体。再后来电脑坏了没法玩了，就这样过去了很长一段时间。现在长大了，懂了许多道理，也有了属于自己的台式电脑。在此正式补票，无论是cs1.6还是cs起源，都是我童年的一部分。也希望大家能够喜欢这个IP，能够尽情享受这个游戏所带来的快乐。FPS可以说是游戏领域的一颗常青树，无论风吹雨打也屹立不倒。CSGO的推出可以说是一个里程碑，是无数人的信仰。最后我有些话想说：也许你只是抱着试试看的心态，也许你想在这款游戏里捞一笔，也许你愤愤开挂。这些都不重要，重要的是你是否收获到了愉悦和快感。倒也不必想这么多，我希望每个人都能够好好体验游戏，好好玩下去。

This game is an absolute masterpiece, no jokes. The first time I've bought this game is like a sparkling joy that I'm one of those luckiest gamers in around the world that can experience what it feels like to restore your own childhood when you were so little. So whoever is coming here, decided to buy, I recommend you to do it right now. After you've bought this masterpiece, you will have no regrets whatsoever.
